comments.content: It clearly is a display version, so maybe ITC Bodoni 72?
Yves, I bow to your knowledge! Seriously, you are amazing.
Sorry I haven’t got time to check, I’m in the middle of a translation. :^/
I’d say it’s ITC Bodoni 72. The “R” is the giveaway that it’s not Bodoni Classic.
